column3: ~~Nevermind, Ive solved the problem.~~\nWell, OK maybe not quite, but I am getting closer.\n
If we're going to disable it, please add an error message, don't ignore the\nflag silently.\n
Changed to fix the problem itself.\n

This logic doesn't look right to me-- won't the message box pop up always with this change?

Should be something like:

```
fServer = GetBoolArg("-server");
#if defined(WIN32) && defined(QT_GUI)
... messageBox(ignoring....)
fServer = false;
#endif
```
